column4: what do i do if my windows 7 computer does not reconize my ubuntu shared folder?
you could always use winscp and ssh to transfer files around.

with ubuntu accessing windows 7 shares. thers some known bugs. You may also want to try entering the share path manually, and dont forget to add a samba password for the linux user. 'sudo smbpasswd -a username'
what is the sharepath? could you give me an example? i already added a samba password
